info.title: Change Record
info.description:
You can create, read, and delete change records as header objects. You can also assign (write), read, and delete the following objects belonging to change records:
 - BOM
 - BOM item
 - Characteristic
 - Class
 - Document info record
 - Equipment BOM
 - Equipment Task List
 - Functional Location BOM
 - Functional Location Task List
 - Maintenance Task List
 - Master Recipes
 - Material
 - Product structure variant
 - Production Routings
 - Standard BOM
 - Variant BOM
 - Collaboration
 - Engineering BOM
 - Manufacturing BOM
 - User Status
 - LifeCycle Status
 - Possible Item Relevance
 - History

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, and modify change records with this asynchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads change record data.
get.description: Retrieves the list of change records in the system. By filtering the result set you can answer questions like how many change records there are in the system, how many are nearing their expected completion date, which change records have a certain responsible, and so on.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)
